word_mean: 自动的：自发的或非随意的，即非因意志作用而产生的
自行运动的，自行调节的

sentence.Network_en: They shot him at point blank range with an automatic rifle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们用自动步枪近距离开枪射杀了他。

sentence.Network_en: An automatic weather station feeds information on wind direction to the computer.
sentence.Network_cn: 自动化气象站将风向信息输入计算机。

sentence.Network_en: An automatic voltage regulator ensured a constant output from the generator.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个自动电压调节器保证了发电机电流输出的稳定。

list.abs: ...。例如，像“我死后要将我的骨灰撒遍月球”这样一种遗嘱的单纯表达（sheer expression），并不自动地（automatically）意味着该遗嘱须得到法律上的尊重。一项法律规范指定在什么条件下遗嘱具有法律效力。因而，规范在逻辑上先于.
automatically becomes head of the student activities committee ., 都会自然而然的成为学生会的头儿.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from Greek automatos 'acting of itself' (see automaton) + -ic

encyclopedia.content: 宇多田光同名歌曲 收录在宇多田光的专辑《Automatic/time will tell》中。 作词：宇多田光 作曲：宇多田光 演唱：宇多田光 歌手简介 宇多田光，身为NHK电视台选出的日本第一天后，与滨崎步、仓木麻衣并称日本平成三大歌姬，是近十年来J-POP的代表性女歌手，坐拥3张日本最畅销的女性原创专辑，曾多年被票选为日本人最喜欢的艺人第一名。 专辑简介 专辑名称：《Automatic/time will tell》 语种： 日语 唱片公司： EMIミュージック&

entry.def: An automatic machine or device is one which has controls that enable it to perform a task without needing to be constantly operated by a person. Automatic methods and processes involve the use of such machines.
An automatic is a gun that keeps firing shots until you stop pulling the trigger.

example.ex: He drew his automatic and began running in the direction of the sounds...
example.tran: 他拔出自动手枪，向声音传来的方向跑去。

example.ex: The gunmen opened fire with automatic weapons.
example.tran: 歹徒用自动武器开火了。

entry.tran: 自动挡汽车;自动变速汽车
entry.def: An automatic is a car in which the gears change automatically as the car's speed increases or decreases.
An automatic action is one that you do without thinking about it.

example.ex: All of the automatic body functions, even breathing, are affected.
example.tran: 身体所有的无意识功能，甚至呼吸，都受到影响。

entry.def: If something such as an action or a punishment is automatic, it happens without people needing to think about it because it is the result of a fixed rule or method.

example.ex: Those drivers should face an automatic charge of manslaughter...
example.tran: 那些司机必然会受到过失杀人的指控。

example.ex: Israel offers automatic citizenship to all Jews who want it.
example.tran: 以色列为所有希望获得公民身份的犹太人敞开大门。

means.word_mean: 2. a pistol that will keep firing until the ammunition is gone or the trigger is released
1. operating with minimal human intervention; independent of external control;

sentences.sentence: "a budget deficit that caused automatic spending cuts"

means.word_mean: 2. like the unthinking functioning of a machine;

Sentence.sentence: Smith touches on construction methods, the revolutionary invention of the automatic lift, the practicalities of living in the sky and the likelihood that, as cities become more crowded, apartment living will become the norm.
The automatic lift is indispensable in skyscrapers

sentences.en: The movements of machines are completely automatic, you only need to start and stop the machines.
sentences.cn: 运行是完全自动的, 你只需开关机器就行了。

means.word_mean: 不假思索的, 无意识的

sentences.en: A boy who has good manners stands up in an automatic movement when a lady enters the room.
sentences.cn: 一个有礼貌的孩子, 在一个女士进入房间时, 便会不假思索地站起来。

sentences.en: You will get an automatic increase in pay every year.
sentences.cn: 你每年一定有一次加薪。

jushi.english: We can get chocolate from an automatic machine.
jushi.chinese: 我们可以从自动售货机上取巧克力。

jushi.english: You will get an automatic increase in pay every year.
jushi.chinese: 你每年一定有一次加薪。

jushi.english: This heating system has an automatic temperature control.
